name: pygbm-monorepo
description: PyGBM - Geometric Brownian Motion Simulator (FastAPI + Next.js)

scripts.dev: echo 'Run backend and frontend in separate terminals:' && echo '  npm run dev:backend' && echo '  npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -type d -name '.pytest_cache' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; rm -rf .coverage htmlcov dist build *.egg-info

author: Basia Koch
